question: who was the first woman to win who wants to be a millionaire
api_result: The first woman to win the top prize on the original U.K. version of "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?" was Judith Keppel in November 2000. She was the first contestant overall to win the £1 million prize on the show. In the U.S. version of the show, the first woman to win the top prize was Nancy Christy, who won $1 million in May 2003.
